Product Title: Moroccanoil Color Care Conditioner

Product Details: {'Brand': 'Moroccanoil', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Shine', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Conditioner,Lock', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 6.5 inches; 9.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Moroccanoil'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:70c7a3a26a8fd9cb6fae4f5d12f45fa5]] I love Moroccan Oil products. I was very excited to get this one. Not only does it help with color-treated hair, but it is in a travel size. The scent is amazing, and it leaves my hair feeling nice and soft.
Review Title: Coco’s Conclusion: Moroccan Oil Conditioner for my Carry-On

reference_summary:
AISI BEAUTY Long Blonde Wig with Bangs Straight Blonde Wigs for Women 24 Inch Synthetic Heat Resistant Cosplay Wigs for Girls Costume Party Wear AISI BEAUTY {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AISI BEAUTY', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.29 x 3.27 inches; 12.31 Ounces'} This is a high-quality wig. My daughter does princess parties, and she can use this for multiple characters. The inside has pins and straps to help it fits better. It also comes with a free set of lashes. The only complaint is that the bangs are long but easy to trim. You could not find a better quality wig for the price. Coco's Conclusion: High Quality Wig, Includes a Set of Lashes Foxgirl Gel Nail Polish Set - 6 Colors Classic Klenin Blue Collection Gel nail polish kit Soak Off LED Nail Art Manicure Kit DIY at Home Gifts for Women Foxgirl {'Brand': 'Foxgirl', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Burgundy,Red', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.81 x 6.38 x 1.38 inches; 6.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '768076972538'} I ordered the blue kit but received a red/pink kit instead. It ended up working well since it's almost Valentine's Day. There was some spillage inside the kit, making it sticky, but every polish is inside a foam cushion, so I don't think it had to do with poor packaging. It goes on fairly smoothly and lasts quite a while. It just wasn't quite as great as expected. Coco's Conclusion: Bright Colors, Leaky Bottles Leotruny Headbands for Women Twist Knotted Elastic Head Wrap Turban for Girls Yoga Workout Hair Accessories (C02-Headbands 6) Leotruny {'Color': 'Assorted Colors', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Elastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Ribbed', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10.83 x 5.43 x 2.24 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} I’ve been using these for my workouts because they stay in place really well. they are too cute to not wear for every day things. The colors are great and modern. They wash easily in the washing machine. Coco’s Conclusion: Cute for Workouts or Everyday Wear Unaone 2 Pcs Retainer Case, Perfect Retainer Box Retainer Container Partial Mouth Guard Case Denture Box Orthodontic Denture Storage Boxes for Travel and Household, Blue Unaone {'Product Dimensions': '3 x 2 x 1 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} These cases are just a little too small for my night guard, and there are no air vents. I am using this for my guard when my other cases are being washed. It suits that purpose just fine. For the price, you do get two cases, soI have backup cases as well. Coco’s Conclusion: Small but Usable Cell Fusion C Low pH pHarrier Mask*10sheets | Intensive weak acid care for all skin types, Korean Face Mask Cell Fusion C {'Item Weight': '200 Grams', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.36 x 2.36 x 3.94 inches', 'Brand': 'Cell Fusion C', 'Item Volume': '250 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 3.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RLE22305'} This mask is very soothing. It smells wonderful and leaves my face feeling moisturized and smooth. Coco’s Conclusion: Moisturizing & Cooling Everyday Beauty Strawberry Exfoliator, Nourishing, Hydrating, and Rich Antioxidant Exfoliating Scrub with Ginseng, Strawberry Seeds, and Black Currant for Dry Dehydrated, and Aging Skin, 1.7 oz. Jar Everyday Beauty {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Information': 'Jar', 'Item Weight': '1.7 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '3.03 x 2.99 x 2.13 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002374', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'} [[VIDEOID:d207b869a6c6780ce894c1c32f8179ae]] This creamy strawberry seed exfoliant is very lotion-like, which left my skin feeling super soft after. It has a great strawberry scent that is mild and not overwhelming. Coco’s Conclusions: Creamy, Like Lotion with a Nice 🍓 Scent, Great Exfoliant Hair Removal Device Ulike {'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 8.46 x 3.82 inches; 3.31 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'UI04', 'UPC': '768461548188'} [[VIDEOID:b35db5602af2156947967b6b6850e6d3]] I have used a few different IPL machines over the years. This one is the first painless one I have had.
Everything is packaged well and comes in a nice case. The machine itself is very easy to use. Once you turn it on, it automatically turns on a cooling mechanism that makes it more pleasant on the skin and less likely to overheat, I would imagine. I would recommend that you read the directions or watch a video on how to operate it. It has different settings that you can change by clicking the right button. There is also a long or short area function on this which is very nice, making it so you can drag the device down a longer area, like a leg, while pressing the button.
The directions say to use the device want to eat for 12 weeks and after that, as needed. I will update the review if sufficient hair removal has not happened at this point in time, but I’m already noticing that I have to shave less. Coco’s Conclusion: Truly Painless, High Quality La Maxime chemical free, natural, organic vegan best brightening hydrating facial exfoliating scrub & mask (2 in 1) pack for wrinkle repair & glowing skin for women men (2.47 ounce) LA MAXIME {'Brand': 'LA MAXIME', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Skin Care,Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Material Type Free': 'Chemical Free', 'Unit Count': '2.47 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '3.35 x 3.35 x 1.97 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DG70', 'UPC': '611138337403'} This product comes in a paste. It has dual qualities as it is an exfoliating scrub and facemask. You can use it for any skin, whether that be oily, combo or normal. It has natural active ingredients, which is my favorite part. It goes on like a paste and has a great scent. I felt like my skin was very hydrated and glowed after use. There are only about 2 1/2 ounces of product in the container, which makes this fairly pricey, but sometimes that is the case with skincare products that work. Coco’s Conclusion: Natural Ingredients, Vegan, No Animal Testing Moroccanoil Color Care Conditioner {'Brand': 'Moroccanoil', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Shine', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Conditioner,Lock', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 6.5 inches; 9.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Moroccanoil'} [[VIDEOID:70c7a3a26a8fd9cb6fae4f5d12f45fa5]] I love Moroccan Oil products. I was very excited to get this one. Not only does it help with color-treated hair, but it is in a travel size. The scent is amazing, and it leaves my hair feeling nice and soft.
